name: To Make and Share
description:
We have travelled together, fought together, forged friendships or strained bonds. Tonight, we have a moment of rest, and we will work together to create a meal and share stories.

To Make and Share is a soup recipe to make in real life while your characters in a longer campaign take a rest! As you make the recipe together you will answer questions about how you know this recipe that will get you thinking about your character's past and give you a way to share their story with your group! And at the end you'll have a tasty meal!
